Package hippodrome

Interface GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralInformationRepository, GeneralInformationRepositoryStub

    public interface GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface
    Interface of the class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia. This item allows the entities playing at an hippodrome to collect information about the various statuses and snapshots all the instants while something is happening.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes
